attributes.action: Remove the ban on ownership of guns and ammunition for use in self defence.
attributes.additional_details: Now it has been revealed the police can sue people who call them for help, if they are injured during any ensuing investigation, the very last port of defence of the innocent has been removed.  WE MUST therefore be allowed to purchase guns and ammunition with which to defend ourselves, our families and our property - THERE IS NOBODY ELSE OUT THERE PREPARED TO DO IT ANYMORE, DESPITE HOW MUCH THEY GET PAID BY US.
